1149:1: sa cet kauśikāyaṃ te jambūdvīpa ityādi |
1149:7: kasmādviśiṣṭaṃ rūpakāyaṃ tathāgataṃ parityajya prajñāpāramitāparigraha iti |
1149:14: yasmādetadbhūtārthikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ śarīraṃ dharmakāyastasya mukhyato dyotanātprajñāpāramitā tathoktā |
1149:16: bhūtārthikatvameva dharmakāyasya kuto yasya dyotanātprajñāpāramitāyāṃ citrīkāra iti |
1149:19: yasmāduktaṃ pradeśāntare bhagavatā dharmakāyā māyopamādvayajñānasvabhāvāḥ prajñāpāramitātmakā buddhā bhagavanta ityanena dṛṣṭānto nirdiṣṭaḥ |
1149:23: tiprasaṅgadoṣaṃ vidadhyādataḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpeṇa niścitatvātkathaṃ māyopamādvayajñānātmakā buddhā bhagavanta iti |
1149:32: syādetatsvasaṃvedanādeva pūrvake jñāne gṛhyamāṇe kāryaṃ pratyānantaryaṃ kāraṇātmakaṃ gṛhītaṃ tathottarasminnapi jñāne gṛhyamāṇe kāryātmakaṃ gṛhītamevānantaryaṃ kāryakāraṇātmakasyānantaryasya tadabhinnasvabhāvatvāditi |
1149:37: tasmādidamasmādanantarambhavatiti paricchedābhāve kāryakāraṇabhāvo niścito na yukto'
1149:42: mā khalu punarimaṃ lakṣaṇavyañjanojjvalaṃ śobhanaṃ kāyaṃ satkāyaṃ he bhikṣavaḥ paramāṇusañcayasvabhāvaṃ manyadhvamiti sādhyadharmaḥ kathitaḥ |
1149:43: dharmakāyapariniṣpattito māyopamādvayasākṣātkriyāniṣpattyā niṣpannaṃ māṃ drakṣyathetyanena heturuktaḥ |
1149:44: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito dharmakāyapariniṣpattyā niṣpanno yaduta prajñāpāramitātatsvabhāva ityanena pakṣadharmopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
1149:46: "yo māyopamādvayajñānabhāvanāpariniṣpattyā niṣpannaḥ sa dharmakāyastadyathā pūrvabuddhā bhagavantaḥ |
1149:49: arthasyātyantaparokṣatvena sākārajñānādibhiśca grahītumaśakyatvādadvayaṃ jñānaṃ svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ svapnādipratyayavadarthākāroparaktaṃ bhāvanīyamiti sthitam |
1149:51: ato'sya manaso bhāvanābalāt sphuṭapratibhāsitvaṃ yattadeva tathāgatatvamiti nāsiddho hetuḥ |
1149:52: sapakṣe bhāvānna viruddha ityabhyupagatapūrvabuddhadharmakāyaṃ pratyeṣa dṛṣṭānto'
1149:54: aviparyastaśceṣyate tathāgata iti viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇam |
1149:57: yaṃ rūpakāyastathāgato bhavyasattvaiḥ samīkṣyate nāsau tāttviko dharmakāyaḥ śāstā kintu paramavimalānantaguṇarāśidharmakāyādhipatyādeva teṣāṃ svajñānaṃ tathābhūtarūpakāyākāreṇa pratibhāsate |
1149:59: yaṃ bhagavāniti śāstṛbuddhyā vikalpayanto darśanavandanādibhirabhyudayaniḥśreyasabhājo bhavanti krameṇa |
1149:61: pi hi vikalpasya pāramparyeṇa hitahetutvaṃ dṛṣṭamevānityatvādivikalpabadvastusambandhānna tu kṣipram |
1149:62: yasmādyāvadbhāvābhiniveśena jñeye vijñānaṃ samupajāyate tāvadatasmiṃstadgrahādbhrāntameva tadvijñānaṃ tattvadarśanāddūrībhavati |
1149:63: tasmādyathā māyākāro bhāvavatpratibhāsamāneṣvapi hastyādiṣu svanirmiteṣu bhāvarūpatayā satyā eta iti nābhiniviśate |
1149:65: nabhyastamahāyānasvarūpapeṇāpyādikarmikeṇa satā kṣipraṃ tāthāgatīmavasthāmavāptumicchatā tathāgatādhipatyabhāvini svajñānapratibimbake rūpakāyatathāgate jagadgurāvabhiniveśayogena pratipattisārā śraddhā vidheyeti |
1149:71: nanu bhede sati kathaṃ mātuḥ pūjayā tathāgatapūjeti |
1149:75: yasmādīdṛśāḥ sarvalokābhyudgatamūrtayo buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāto niṣpadyante |
1149:78: yadāśrayeṇa yatpūjyaṃ bhavati tatpūjāyāṃ tadeva pūjitaṃ bhavati ityetadeva dṛṣṭāntapūrvakaṃ spaṣṭayannāha |
1149:80: sudharmā nāma devasabhā sumerusthitasudarśananagarasya bahireva dakṣiṇapaścime sthitā |
1149:89: maheśākhyā cāsau mahānubhāvasaṃjñakatvena hetupratyayabhūtā ca yathākramamupādānasahakārikāraṇabhedāditi tathoktā |
1149:95: ato na tānyapūrvasarvajñatotpattiṃ hetupratyayabhūtāni kintu niṣpatterūttarakālaṃ sthitihetutvenāśrayabhūtānīti |
1149:101: api tu khalu punarityādikāraṇavacanaṃ gatārthamapi prasaṅgāntareṇoktatvānna punaruktam |
1149:110: suviśuddhāt kāraṇāt samutpannaṃ phalaṃ suviśuddhamevopajāyata iti kṛtvā |
1149:111: yasmāt prajñāpāramitayā mahānubhāvatvotpādanena paribhāvitāstathāgatāḥ sarvathā vāsitāstasmāttadutpattyā pūjāṃ labhanta iti |
1149:140: samastaṃ vastreṇa pariveṣṭayitvā tadekadeśena vā baḍgheti jñeyam |
1149:154: yasmādvikalpasya svākāraṃ bāhyarūpeṇādhyāropya pravartanādatasmiṃstadgraheṇa svayamavidyāsvabhāvasya sadbhāve'
1149:156: tasmānnityasamāhitānāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitājñānaprabhāvato yathādhimuktibhavyānāmasaṃkīrṇadeśanānirbhāsāḥ svajñānapratyayāḥ samupajāyanta ityevaṃvidhapratyayānusāreṇa teṣāṃ deśanā bhagavatāṃ vyavasthāpitā |
1149:157: ataḥ śuddhalaukikajñānasammukhībhāvo muninaivaṃ prakāśita ityādivineyajanahitādhyavasāyena kvacitsaṅgītikartṛbhiruktaḥ |
1149:160: tathedānīntanānāmapi dharmabhāṇakānāṃ deśanā bhagavataḥ parasparāvalāyātatvena prajñāpāramitājñānādhipatyanirjātatvāt pūjyetyarthaḥ |
1149:185: "yasmānmātuḥ prabhāvena bhagavān prayogāvasthāyāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ cittānuṣṭhānāni prajānāti pṛṣṭhāvasthāyāṃ saṃpaśyati,
1149:202: yathā ca pūrvaṅgamā bhavati tathā prāgāveditam |
1149:212: apāramitāvyavacchedātpāramitārūpeṇa viśeṣo na ceti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ |
1149:218: atadrūpaparāvṛttyā na ca chāyāviśeṣastathaivaikaśabdavācyatvānna ca nānākaraṇam |
1149:227: etāvatyeva svaparobhayārthabhedena pratyekaṃ navaprakāratvenādhimuktiḥ saptaviṃśatiprakāraiveti na vipratipattiḥ kāryā |
1149:233: yathoktena ca granthaprabhānena kramāduttarottarādhikānuśaṃsāpratipādanapareṇānyāpadeśena sarva evāyamadhimuktimanaskāraḥ paridīpitaḥ |
1149:241: bhyupagamyamāne yāvānanuśaṃsaḥ sambhavati tāvataḥ sakṛdevābhidhānādgranthaprabhānasya nirarthakatā syāditi pūrvācāryāḥ |
